TopicTitle: [0.90] Can not add maneuver node in Mun tutorial

Articles.Content: I'm new to KSP so trying to complete tutorials. It seems it is not possible to add maneuver node during the tutorial Mun 1, therefore the tutorial stucks at the begining and no way to completet it. Does anyone experince the same?

I had the same problem, I was testing why I did not have it in the Career game. I think if you have not achieve it in career mode and go over to the tutorials, then the maneuver node does not show up. That was my problem anyway. If you go direct to the tutorial I don't think there is a problem.

I have been having all kinds of problems with maneuver nodes myself for the last two versions. Sometimes the game just won't let me place a node for a particular ship, no matter how I hunt about and click on its trajectory. FWIW, quicksaving and reloading generally cures the problem, as it does the frequent freezing up of my staging that seems to have been happening for the last two versions as well.

I also have problems placing maneuver nodes, but in career game.

If a vessel is on a escape trajectory, I can't place maneuver node between vessel and Periapsis. But I can place it after periapsis.

if a vessel is not n a escape trajectory, everything is OK.

I have unlocked Mision controll to Lvl 2 and Tracking station to Lvl 2
Same issue here, created an account to report it. If you go directly to that mission from the tutorials list, you will not be able to place a Maneuver Node. Tutorial cannot be completed.
